personal_data.name: Rodolfo Silva
personal_data.profession: Software Engineer, Full-stack Developer & Systems Analyst
personal_data.description: I am driven by my passion for creating attractive and functional designs, developing elegantly simple solutions.

profile.about_title: Hi, I'm Rodolfo Silva. Thank you for visiting my site.
profile.about_description: Experienced Web Developer adept in all stages of web development. Knowledgeable in user interface, testing, and maintenance of web systems. Equipped with a diverse and promising skill set. Proficient in various technologies, including Java, SpringBoot, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, React, MongoDB, and MySQL. Capable of effectively self-managing during independent projects and collaborating in a team.

degrees.description: The course trained me to operate in a growing local technology market that demands integrated electronic and computer engineering knowledge. It aimed to equip me with skills to specify, design, develop, maintain, and manage computer systems (hardware and software) applied to the local context.

WEB Development Course with ES6, TypeScript and Angular
Machine Learning and Data Science with Python
Introduction to the Spring Boot Framework
Working with Bank Data using JDBC and JPA
Introduction to object orientation with Java

list.name: IoT System App
list.description: This is the frontend for the IoT System API, built with Angular. The frontend allows users to interact with the IoT devices, manage them, and monitor their statuses.

app_details.deployment: This project is automatically deployed using AWS Amplify. A pipeline defined in the amplify.yml file handles the continuous deployment process. The application is available at: https://iot-system.rodolfo-silva.com

hosting.description: The frontend is hosted using AWS Amplify, providing continuous deployment and hosting services.

tests_aux.how_to_execute: Run `ng test` to execute the unit tests.
tests_aux.report_details: Unit test report is generated by Jasmine and Karma.

tests_aux.how_to_execute: Run `npx cypress run` to execute the automated tests.
tests_aux.report_details: Automated test report is generated by Cypress and is available at:

api_details.deployment: The IoT System API is deployed on an AWS EC2 instance running Amazon Linux. The deployment process is automated using GitHub Actions.

hosting.description: The backend API is hosted on an AWS EC2 instance running Amazon Linux, providing a robust and scalable environment for the application.

tests.how_to_execute: Run `./gradlew test` to execute both unit and integration tests.
tests.report_details: The report is generated using JaCoCo through the deployment pipeline in GitHub Actions, and is copied directly to a folder within the EC2 Linux instance on AWS.

list.name: Clubinho NIB
list.description: A pedagogical support platform for teachers engaged in evangelism for children, providing resources and tools to organize and enhance their activities.

app_details.deployment: This project is automatically deployed using AWS Amplify with CI/CD integrated via GitHub. The application is available at: https://clubinhonib.com/

hosting.description: The frontend is hosted using AWS Amplify with a custom domain, providing continuous deployment and hosting services integrated with GitHub.

tests_aux.how_to_execute: Run `npm test` to execute the unit tests.
tests_aux.report_details: Unit test report is generated by Jest and Jasmine.

tests_aux.how_to_execute: Run `npx cypress run` to execute the automated tests.
tests_aux.report_details: Automated test report is generated by Cypress and is available at:

api_details.deployment: The backend API is deployed on an AWS EC2 instance using Docker containers. GitHub Actions pushes images to Docker Hub, and the EC2 instance pulls and deploys them automatically. Additionally, AWS Lambda is integrated for specific serverless tasks.

hosting.description: The backend API is hosted on AWS EC2 with Docker, using a CI/CD pipeline from GitHub Actions and images stored on Docker Hub. AWS Lambda is leveraged for additional serverless features.

tests.how_to_execute: Run `npm test` for Jest tests and `./gradlew test` for JUnit tests.
tests.report_details: Test coverage reports are generated during the CI/CD process and can be integrated into the deployment pipeline.

footer.about_description: Diego Seven Sistemas specializes in software, web, and mobile development and delivers innovative solutions for business needs.

responsibilities: Work as a full stack developer on large-scale B2C projects for Motorola, focusing on high-performance and scalable solutions.
Develop modern web interfaces using React, building reusable components and optimizing performance for enhanced user experience.
Design and maintain REST APIs and backend services with NestJS, applying clean architecture principles and dependency injection.
Model and integrate data with MySQL for persistence and Redis for high-performance caching, ensuring low latency and horizontal scalability.
Responsible for cloud architecture and engineering on AWS, implementing solutions using EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, CloudFront, and API Gateway for production and staging environments.
Leverage Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and CI/CD practices to automate pipelines and enable consistent deployments.
Actively participate in Agile Scrum planning using Jira and Confluence for sprint management, backlog tracking, and technical documentation.
Perform code reviews ensuring quality standards and best practices in Git version control workflows.
Contribute to system optimization and monitoring, analyzing metrics and logs to prevent failures and ensure high availability.
Support strategic technical decisions regarding cloud architecture and scalability to meet the demands of millions of end users.
experiences.stacks: React, NestJS, TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), MySQL, Redis, AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, CloudFront, API Gateway), Git, Jira, Confluence, Docker, Agile (Scrum)

responsibilities: Design and develop applications using Agile Scrum methodology, using Atlassian tools like Jira and Confluence, dividing the project into multiple sprints.
Use Bitbucket for version control collaborating with other developers using pull requests.
Bamboo and Nexus are used for continuous integration of builds.
Design and develop web applications using HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript, Angular, and NodeJS.
Responsible for the style, appearance, and behavior of the web page with SASS that extends CSS with dynamic behavior such as variables, mixins, operations, and functions.
Use custom Angular directives and develop reusable components and templates that could be reused in various locations of the application.
Develop reusable Typescript components and services to consume REST APIs using component-based architecture provided by Angular.
Develop new endpoints in SpringBoot that provided JSON data to the Angular web application.
Implement HTTP requests using the Observable RxJS library to handle multiple types of values.
Experienced working with advanced JavaScript like ECMAScript 6 (ES6).
Develop unit tests for all classes created using Jest Framework, JUnit, and Mockito in TDD environment.
Develop APIs to interact with the database using Spring Boot. Worked extensively with Spring JDBC, Spring Hibernate ORM, and JPA.
Use Swagger to document all service APIs, documenting request body, header, and response details.
experiences.stacks: Angular, JavaScript, Typescript, npm, NodeJs, Spring Boot, JUnit, Mockito, Java, MySQL, MongoDB, Linux, Docker, Bamboo, Nexus, Bitbucket and Git Bash
